channel.title: Spider-Verse on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Spider-Verse’ Spinoff ‘Spider-Punk’ in the Works With Daniel Kaluuya
item.description: The Spider-Verse is expanding again. “Spider-Punk,” a spinoff of 2023’s animated hit “Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse,” is in early development at Sony Pictures Anima
